languages.text: Один шаг — и неизвестная сила заметила Лорд-капитана, схватив и протащив {mf|его|ее} сквозь искривленное пространство картины. Теперь глаза Лорд-капитана видели ясно: мрачная тень давно усопшего навигатора склонилась над Кассией и, стиснув в когтистых пальцах ее тонкую шею, кричала:

traits.locale_text: Один шаг — и неизвестная сила замечает Вольного Торговца, протаскивает сквозь искривленное пространство картины и бросает у ног двух фигур. Теперь глаза Лорд-капитана видят ясно: мрачная тень давно усопшего Навигатора склонилась над Кассией и, стиснув в когтистых пальцах ее тонкую шею, продолжает кричать:

languages.text: One step was all it took for some unknown force to notice the Lord Captain, seize {mf|him|her}, and drag {mf|him|her} through the painting's twisted space. Now the Lord Captain could clearly see the dark shade of the long-dead Navigator leaning over Cassia. Clutching her neck in its clawed fingers, the shade screamed,
languages.original_text: Один шаг — и неизвестная сила заметила Лорд-капитана, схватив и протащив {mf|его|ее} сквозь искривленное пространство картины. Now the Lord Captain could clearly see the dark shade of the long-dead Navigator leaning over Cassia. Clutching her neck in its clawed fingers, the shade screamed,

Now the Lord Captain could clearly see the dark shade of the long-dead Navigator leaning over Cassia. Clutching her neck in its clawed fingers, the shade screamed,

Now the Lord Captain could clearly see the dark shade of the long-dead Navigator leaning over Cassia. Clutching her neck in its clawed fingers, the shade screamed,

One step was all it took for some unknown force to notice the Lord Captain, seize {mf|him|her}, and drag {mf|him|her} through the painting's twisted space. Now the Lord Captain could clearly see the dark shade of the long-dead Navigator leaning over Cassia. Clutching her neck in its clawed fingers, the shade screamed,

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンは一歩進んだだけで、その存在を感知した未知の力に取り押さえられ、絵のねじれ空間を引き回された。今のロード・キャプテンには、はるか昔に亡くなった航宙士の黒い影がカシアに向かって身を乗り出す様子が見えていた。影はカシアの首を長い爪の指で握って叫ぶ。
languages.original_text: One step was all it took for some unknown force to notice the Lord Captain, seize {mf|him|her}, and drag {mf|him|her} through the painting's twisted space. Now the Lord Captain could clearly see the dark shade of the long-dead Navigator leaning over Cassia. Clutching her neck in its clawed fingers, the shade screamed,

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンは一歩進んだだけで、その存在を感知した未知の力に取り押さえられ、絵のねじれ空間を引き回された。今のロード・キャプテンには、はるか昔に亡くなった航宙士の黒い影がカシアに向かって身を乗り出す様子が見えていた。影はカシアの首を長い爪の指で握って叫ぶ。

languages.text: 舰长大人往前走了一步，某种未知的力量注意到了{mf|他|她}，拖着{mf|他|她}穿过画中扭曲的空间。此刻，舰长大人可以清楚地看到，那个死去很久的导航者的黑影，此刻正俯身压在卡西娅身上。黑影的利爪紧紧地掐住卡西娅的脖子，发出了尖叫声。
languages.original_text: One step was all it took for some unknown force to notice the Lord Captain, seize {mf|him|her}, and drag {mf|him|her} through the painting's twisted space. Now the Lord Captain could clearly see the dark shade of the long-dead Navigator leaning over Cassia. Clutching her neck in its clawed fingers, the shade screamed,

traits.locale_text: 舰长大人往前走了一步，某种未知的力量注意到了{mf|他|她}，拖着{mf|他|她}穿过画中扭曲的空间。此刻，舰长大人可以清楚地看到，那个死去很久的导航者的黑影，此刻正俯身压在卡西娅身上。黑影的利爪紧紧地掐住卡西娅的脖子，发出了尖叫声。

languages.text: Un pas suffit pour qu'une force inconnue prenne conscience de la présence {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} et l'attire dans l'espace distordu du tableau. {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} pouvait désormais voir la silhouette sombre de la défunte navigatrice se pencher sur Cassia, enserrer son cou de ses mains griffues et hurler :
languages.original_text: One step was all it took for some unknown force to notice the Lord Captain, seize {mf|him|her}, and drag {mf|him|her} through the painting's twisted space. Now the Lord Captain could clearly see the dark shade of the long-dead Navigator leaning over Cassia. Clutching her neck in its clawed fingers, the shade screamed,

traits.locale_text: Un pas suffit pour qu'une force inconnue prenne conscience de la présence {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} et l'attire dans l'espace distordu du tableau. {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} pouvait désormais voir la silhouette sombre de la défunte navigatrice se pencher sur Cassia, enserrer son cou de ses mains griffues et hurler :

languages.text: Un solo paso bastó para que alguna fuerza desconocida advirtiese la presencia {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán, {mf|lo|la} agarrase y {mf|lo|la} arrastrase a través de la distorsionada imagen del lienzo. Entonces {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán pudo ver con claridad la oscura silueta de la difunta navegante inclinándose sobre Cassia. La sombra cerró sus dedos como garras en torno al cuello de la lady navegante y gritó.
languages.original_text: One step was all it took for some unknown force to notice the Lord Captain, seize {mf|him|her}, and drag {mf|him|her} through the painting's twisted space. Now the Lord Captain could clearly see the dark shade of the long-dead Navigator leaning over Cassia. Clutching her neck in its clawed fingers, the shade screamed,

traits.locale_text: Un solo paso bastó para que alguna fuerza desconocida advirtiese la presencia {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán, {mf|lo|la} agarrase y {mf|lo|la} arrastrase a través de la distorsionada imagen del lienzo. Entonces {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán pudo ver con claridad la oscura silueta de la difunta navegante inclinándose sobre Cassia. La sombra cerró sus dedos como garras en torno al cuello de la lady navegante y gritó.

languages.text: Ein Schritt, mehr war nicht nötig, damit eine unbekannte Macht den Lord Captain packte und ihn durch den verzerrten Raum des Gemäldes zog. Nun konnte der Lord Captain ganz klar den dunklen Schatten der längst toten Navigatorin sehen, die sich über Cassia beugte. Der Schatten hielt Cassias Hals in seinen klauenbewehrten Finger und schrie:
languages.original_text: One step was all it took for some unknown force to notice the Lord Captain, seize {mf|him|her}, and drag {mf|him|her} through the painting's twisted space. Now the Lord Captain could clearly see the dark shade of the long-dead Navigator leaning over Cassia. Clutching her neck in its clawed fingers, the shade screamed,

traits.locale_text: Ein Schritt, mehr war nicht nötig, damit eine unbekannte Macht den Lord Captain packte und ihn durch den verzerrten Raum des Gemäldes zog. Nun konnte der Lord Captain ganz klar den dunklen Schatten der längst toten Navigatorin sehen, die sich über Cassia beugte. Der Schatten hielt Cassias Hals in seinen klauenbewehrten Finger und schrie:

languages.text: Attığı tek bir adım, bilinmeyen bir gücün Lord Kaptan'ı fark edip tuttuğu gibi tablonun çarpık boşluğunda sürüklemesine yetti. Artık Lord Kaptan, çoktan ölmüş Rotacı'nın karanlık silüetinin Cassia'nın üzerine eğildiğini açıkça görebiliyordu. Pençeli parmaklarıyla Cassia'nın boynunu sıkıca tutan silüet haykırmaya başladı.
languages.original_text: One step was all it took for some unknown force to notice the Lord Captain, seize {mf|him|her}, and drag {mf|him|her} through the painting's twisted space. Now the Lord Captain could clearly see the dark shade of the long-dead Navigator leaning over Cassia. Clutching her neck in its clawed fingers, the shade screamed,

traits.locale_text: Bilinmeyen bir gücün Lord Kaptan'ı fark edip tuttuğu gibi tablonun çarpık boşluğunda sürüklemesi için tek bir adım yetti. Artık Lord Kaptan, çoktan ölmüş Rotacı'nın karanlık silüetinin Cassia'nın üzerine eğildiğini açıkça görebiliyordu. Pençeli parmaklarıyla Cassia'nın boynunu sıkıca tutan silüet haykırdı:
